Classes

DiskIntensityMart.h File Reference

Class for encapsulating microarray data and storing it on disk in a reasonable way to reduce memory impact. Key idea is to reorganize the data on disk in the order which it will be used by the application to avoid lots of seeks. Hopefully with a small number of seeks the performance impact of on-disk stoarage will be minimal. More...

Classes

class  DiskIntensityMart
 Very simple version of an IntensityMart based directly on cel files for comparison and troubleshooting. More...

Detailed Description

Class for encapsulating microarray data and storing it on disk in a reasonable way to reduce memory impact. Key idea is to reorganize the data on disk in the order which it will be used by the application to avoid lots of seeks. Hopefully with a small number of seeks the performance impact of on-disk stoarage will be minimal.
